name: Grimmy888
text: The pizza was great, I had no problems with the waiter serving. The food did take a bit to come out, But it was worth it as the pizza wasn't too hot nor cold. Me and my girlfriend had a perfect lunch to finish the rest of our night with.

name: Cyglenda Miller
text: Very friendly staff.  Went above and beyond to make sure we had a great visit. Took my mom for her birthday and they gave her a cookie pizza for free. Pizza was very good also!

name: Quentin H
text: THE WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE IN MARYLAND!!! Called today and they messed my order up guy told me I had to deal with it (ordered 8 traditional wings but got delivered bone out instead he told me since I didn’t say 6 then he thought I ordered …More

name: Adrian Czmielewski
text: Pizza hut as expected. The service was excellent, the pizza was decent but didnt aspire one to eat more than one or two slices. Surprisingly tasted even better cold

name: David Goodwin
text: Hot and fresh. Called it in from a long day trip. We had 5 hungry kids in the car. It was ready when we got there, and hot. Cashier gave us plates and napkins. We will be back.

name: Ginger Marie
text: This location is handled by one of the best managers I have ever come across! And one of their waitresses, Shay, is one of the BEST that I have ever had!

name: im da bes
text: Very rude staff. I live in Cumberland. And I thought that they could deliver up here but they said that they did local deliveries. Then the woman on the phone had the nerve to tell me, "Go call the pizza hut in lavale or something." I was …More

name: DANIEL LEWIS
text: Cool staff and super cheap good food.

name: Vincent Ciaramella
text: Best Pizza Hut in the world. It's clean, the staff are friendly and food delicious

name: Latisha Lewis
text: Horrible! The first time I ordered boneless wings from the meal deal, I received actual wings. I am pretty sure that the wings were not fresh. In addition, the pizza was cold, only reason I ordered again was because I was given a promo …More

name: Lisa Gardner
text: The food is good. Doesn't seem to have a lot of business. Needs a remodel. Still go, you will love the food.

name: Kevin George
text: The "Lightest" and fluffiest pan pizza in the area...  and is on point 90% of the time! Only time it sucks is when the guy with the stupid hat is working... every time.

name: Daniel Coleman
text: Art Crum and Dustin Wahl are completely wrong. We had great service by Allen. The salad, pizza, and cookie dessert were all delicious.nice conversation with Allen as well. We will return on our next trip out this way

name: Arthur Crum, REALTOR
text: Pizza is almost always terrible and customer service is non-existent. Wait times are always longer than what they say as well. I'm a big fan of Pizza Hut in general but this one is truly a mess.

name: Ian Shaver
text: found mold in our sauce for breadsticks, how on earth they could pre- portion so much sauce that it would mold is beyond me. Also, don't ask for any help from management for such issues.

name: B B
text: Only two guys running the whole place...not too bad !

name: Dave Schott
text: We don't go to the hut like we used to. Staff is constantly changing and the quality does with it.

name: dustin wahl
text: The is the worst place to eat if u want good service and nice people to have helping you

name: Rhonda Barron
text: Buffet didn't have enough choices

name: milton trejo
text: I tried to place an order but no one is picking up the phone. Are they still in business?

name: Janet Entzminger
text: Friendly people, we were traveling to DC.

name: Robert Gould
text: Good buffet

name: Chennakesava Gunda
text: Tasty pizza

name: Rosebud S
text: Food good.

name: GREG ACTON
text: Over priced

name: Ginny Riggs
text: Enjoyed eating there

name: Frank vC
text: Great and friendly staff

name: suz Hoch
text: Great pizza

name: Melissa Brinkley
text: Fast!!

name: Phil Lashbaugh
text: Great

name: MAin Smith
text: Poor customer service, when me and my friends recently went and when we were about to pay the cashier had attitude. I did not appreciate

name: Troy Hartman
text: Menu, food has changed.  If you havent been there in a year it is worth a revisit.

name: Jonathan Klopfer
text: Fri3ndly and funny staff.

name: Sean Brady
text: Don't.

name: Mark Lewis
text: Worst trip here ever waited 1 hr for pizza and waiter never stopped back at to see if we needed anything
